original_text: This is the law for him in whom is a case of leprous disease, who cannot afford the offerings for his cleansing.”
korean_text: 나병 환자로서 그 정결예식에 그의 힘이 미치지 못한 자의 규례가 그러하니라

sentences.original_text: This is the law for him
in whom is a case of leprous disease,
who cannot afford the offerings for his cleansing.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 정결을 위한 제물을 감당할 수 없습니다.
